backend/main.mo: Actor canister handling user profiles, admin‑controlled dashboard fields, public contact info, and message terminal storage using access control and mixin storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of autogenerated short descriptions for many frontend files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global background/text styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading fonts and mounting the React app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and layout, including protected admin routing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for collecting and saving a user's name and email via profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/connect/AccessGr: Modal displaying access‑granted email content with copy functionality and continue action.
frontend/src/components/connect/AdminAdm: Admin login panel using Internet Identity with login/logout handling and navigation to admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/connect/DirectCo: Displays official contact methods with icons and links for phone, email, and Instagram.
frontend/src/components/connect/Founders: Protected contact vault requiring authentication and profile completion, showing secure contact info when unlocked.
frontend/src/components/connect/Messagin: Form to submit messages, save them, and provide email or clipboard options after submission.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Contac: Admin dashboard module that fetches and displays contact info with a copy‑to‑clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Status: Dashboard cards showing system uptime and NTP status with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/landing/Circuitr: Canvas-based animated circuitry background with pulsing neon nodes and resize handling.
frontend/src/components/landing/ConnectG: Renders public contact links and an administrative access panel in a two-column layout.
frontend/src/components/landing/CoreValu: Displays three core values with icons in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/landing/DigitalC: A live-updating digital clock component using a 1‑second interval.
frontend/src/components/landing/Executiv: Shows executive board members with roles and navigation to the full board page.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero banner with animated backgrounds, pulsing logo, and digital clock.
frontend/src/components/landing/Particle: Interactive particle animation with mouse‑reactive movement and connecting lines.
frontend/src/components/landing/ProductS: Showcases TT‑1 hardware with images and a grid of technical features.
frontend/src/components/landing/PublicCo: Provides email and Instagram contact links in a styled card layout.
frontend/src/components/landing/SyncingI: Parallax-scrolling background with layered gradients, grid texture, and poster image.
frontend/src/components/landing/WelcomeN: Renders a styled landing section with a vision statement quote and branding text.
frontend/src/components/layout/DeepTechL: Defines a layout wrapper with header, footer, and deep-tech background styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Provides footer navigation, system status indicators, and branding links with dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements the site header with logo, navigation, authentication-aware actions, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/product/Interact: Displays a 3D component card with expandable technical details and alternating layout.
frontend/src/components/routing/AccessDe: Shows an access-denied message for authenticated non-admin users with return and logout options.
frontend/src/components/routing/RequireA: Wraps children with an admin check, showing loading or denial screens as needed.
Protects routes by requiring authentication, showing initialization state or redirecting home.
frontend/src/constants/brand.ts: Exports static brand asset paths including the logo file location.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCheck.ts: Queries the backend to determine if the current caller has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactInfo.ts: Fetches contact information from the backend via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and update the current user's profile using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardStatus.ts: Retrieves dashboard status from the backend with periodic refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, managing identity state and login lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessageTerminal.ts: Contains hooks to submit and fetch message terminal entries through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom color variables, global styles, and utility classes including gradients, glass panels, neon accents, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AchievementsPage.tsx: Renders a grid of achievement cards with titles, descriptions, and verification indicators.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Displays the admin dashboard header and loads status and contact modules using the current user profile.
frontend/src/pages/BoardPage.tsx: Shows an interactive board of founders with expandable descriptions triggered by hover or tap.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectSupportPage.ts: Provides messaging and contact sections for public communication with the team.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the landing page using multiple themed sections such as hero, product, values, board, and contact.
frontend/src/pages/LegalTechnicalDocsPag: Presents terms of service, IP ownership, and safety audit details for the TT‑1 system.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Contains the privacy policy outlining data collection, usage, security, retention, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDeepDivePage.t: Renders a product deep‑dive page showcasing multiple hardware components using Interactive3DComponentCard with images and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: Displays the Terms of Service with sections on IP ownership, usage rules, liability, and contact details in a styled layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and extended theme settings for the project’s UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, goals, constraints, required assets, and architectural notes for ongoing development.
